full_description:
Duration:
24 Months contract with possible extension
\n
Job Description and Required Services:
\n
\n
The position of Administrative Assistant in the Community Development Unit of Consumer Examinations Unit, Consumer Protection and Financial Enforcement Division, will support the work of CDU by assisting with the following: • Review and analysis of branch opening, closing, and relocation applications• Review and analysis of bank mergers, conversions, field of membership expansions, and change of control• Review and analysis of Banking Development District (BDD) Program requests for renewal of deposit applications• Review and analysis of BDD Progress Report forms• Assistance with data analysis, mainly socioeconomic data, and data analysis for geocoding purposes• Other related duties as needed
\n
\n
Minimum Candidate Qualifications:
\n
\n
Bachelor’s Degree
in business administration, economics, geography, political science, public administration, sociology, urban planning, or related discipline.
\n
\n
At least one year of experience
in
community development, economic development, or constituent services, in either the public or nonprofit sectors.
At least one year of experience in report writing, and review and analysis of reports, applications, etc., measuring public impact.
\n
Skill Requirements:
\n
\n
Highly organized and careful worker, highly self-motivated and capable of prioritizing and managing multiple tasks.
\n
Strong writing skills.
\n
Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office suite products.
\n
\n
Job Type: Contract
\n
Pay: $40.00 - $55.00 per hour
\n
Work Location: Hybrid remote in New York, NY 10004
